feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: F150 Mahndruck Sprache Standardtexte
entry.content:
Hallo SAP-Support,

wir suchen nach einer Möglichkeit die Sprache für die Standardtexts zu beeinflussen und von KNA1 abzuweichen. Eine analoge Logik wie in 2632165 wäre ideal:

  1. Empfängersprache (KNA1)
  2. Englisch
  3. Anmeldesprache
  4. Sprache des Textes, wenn dieser nur in einer einzigen Sprache vorhanden ist

Wir nutzen PRINT_DUNNING_NOTICE_SF und wollen in einem Mahnverfahren nur in DE oder EN kommunizieren und die Texte auch nur in diesen beiden Sprachen pflegen.

Vielen Dank!

entry.title: After doing the GR for PO 4500053123 Stock moves to wrong location in auto
entry.content: After doing the GR for PO 4500053123 Stock does not transfer from vendors Damaged location to Warehouse repaired location. Instead of that it transfers to Vendors repaired location. so, need to transfer this to warehouse repaired location.

entry.title: Error replicating business partner (customers) from Sales Cloud v2 to S/4HANA on-premise
entry.content:
Hello dear SAP community,
We are currently trying to replicate business partners (customers) from our Sales Cloud v2 to our S/4HANA on-premise and are currently receiving the following error message:

After receiving the error message, I started the debugger and found that the error occurs at the source code:

S/4 cannot find a logical system for the sending business system (Sales Cloud v2) and therefore aborts the import of the customer. Do you know where in Customizing/Development the logical system still needs to be stored for the sending business system?

We have implemented  BAdI MDG_IDM_GET_LCL_SYSTEM the following way:

For the logical system the BAdI deteremines the receiving system (S/4HANA).

We have also maintained a mapping between the business system and logical system for the Sales Cloud v2:

We do not use System Landscape Directory (SLD). We have based our approach on the 6KO integration guide https://support.sap.com/content/dam/SAAP/Sol_Pack/S4O/Library/Setup/6KO_S4HANA2023_Set-Up_EN_XX.pdf, the replication of business partners (customers) from the S/4HANA to Sales Cloud v2 already works.

Do you have any further advice for us?

Best Regards

Omid

entry.title: Services for Objects not working properly from Fiori tile;
entry.content:
Hello Team,

In fiori, when trying to open Services for Object we have to click and wait for it to open.

Most of the time you think you didn't click on it so you keep clicking on the button until it opens and closes as many times as you clicked on the button.

Basis team already confirmed that there are no logs related to it in last 30 days.

Is it due to any performance issue ? could you please check and let us know.

entry.title: S/4HANAの新リース会計基準対応について
entry.content:
固定資産の新リース会計基準改正については、２０２７年（令和９年）４月１日以降に開始が国税庁から公表されております。

 

S/4HANAの対応のノート（ケース）を検索しましたが見当たりません、公開されておりますか、または公開予定はありますか？

 

教えてだきたくお願いいたします。

entry.title: How to create an Extension of an Extension Ledger
entry.content:
We would like to create an Extension ledger on top of another Extension Ledger. Both Type G.

Is this possible? SAP Documentation says we can, but I cannot select an Extension Ledger as an Underlying Ledger.

What we want to do:

Leading Ledger is 0L

E1 - Extension Ledger with 0L as the underlying ledger

E2 - Extension Ledger with 0L + E1 as underlying Ledger.

entry.content: We are migrating the assets (from ECC) to S/4 HANA and we need to maintain in the RE-FX contract both net worth value specified (legacy) and net present value under a condition for single contract object as a statistical posting. Is it a recommended practice to maintain both conditions under the RE-FX contract master data?

entry.content:

thank

P

entry.title: Multiple versions of same record in ODQMON causing delta load issue from S/4 to Informatica
entry.content:
Hi Experts, seeking your help on below issue/scenario.

Scenario - Data is being pulled into informatica system from S/4 system via CDS view. CDS view is CDC(change data capture) enabled with table elements and view elemenst.

Issue - if a same key combination single record is changed multiple times( say 3 times) between 2 deltas, then ODQMON has 3 version of same data based on timestamp. However, when it moves to Informatica system, all 3 records flow without timestamp. Timestamp isn't part of CDS view as base table doesn't have change timestamp. So, there is no way in Informatica system to identify the latest record. CDS view with CDC enablement has been created on below FICA tables
DFKKKO - has timestamp
DFKKOP 
DFKKOPK
DFKKSUM
DFKKSUMC
DFKKINVDOC_I
DFKKINVDOC_H
DFKKINVBILL_H
DFKKINVBILL_I

Any workaround or any help will be appreciated. Thank You.

entry.title: Automatic proposal of S/4 functionality for existing custom code - 'Back to Standard'
entry.content:
Hi,

Are there any tools that anyone has used to get Automatic proposal of standard S/4 functionality that could be mapped to the existing custom code. This is to enable the movement of custom code to S/4 standard functionality from a clean core perspective. I am not looking for an automatic match and convert functionality but at least something that can generate good proposals based on which the decision can be taken.

I am sure technology and relevant data/knowledge is available but surprised to find no tools (potentially AI based) available to do this in the market. Please note that I am not looking for tools to remediate custom code for which there are plenty of tools available.

Any pointers would be appreciated.

Regards,

Sharadha

entry.title: Assistance Required in Connecting to SAP S/4HANA OData Service via External Clients (Postman / Appli
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Team,

I am currently working on establishing an external connection to our SAP S/4HANA system using OData APIs, as part of an application integration requirement.

I have already identified the OData service endpoint using the SAP transaction/n/IWFND/MAINT_SERVICEand successfully activated the service. The OData service functions correctly from within the SAP Logon / SAP GUI environment, confirming that the service itself is active and reachable from the internal SAP side.

However, I am facing difficulties when attempting to access the same OData endpoint using Postman (and subsequently from my application). The connection attempt either times out or fails to find the host.

Below are the current details and findings:

Details:

  • SAP System Type: S/4HANA

  • Service Activation: Done via /IWFND/MAINT_SERVICE

  • Service Status: Active and working when accessed within SAP GUI

  • OData URL (sample):
    https://<host>:<port>/sap/opu/odata/sap/<SERVICE_NAME>/

  • Authentication Types I want to test:

    • Basic Authentication (username/password)

    • OAuth 2.0

  • Observed Behaviour:

    • Works inside SAP LOGON

    • Fails when accessed externally via Postman — results in connection timeout or authentication failure, or host not found (different behaviour with different host and port names)

    • Verified the host and port from the working internal configuration

Assistance Requested:

Kindly help me with the following points:

  1. Network / Access Validation:

    • Confirm if the OData service endpoint is accessible externally (from my workstation or integration environment).

    • Verify if any network/firewall restrictions are preventing external HTTP(S) access to the given host/port.

  2. Authentication Configuration:

    • Clarify which authentication mechanisms are supported for external OData access (Basic Auth, OAuth, or any other).Guiden enabling both types of authentication so that I can test successfully through Postman.

  3. Connection Parameters:

    • Confirm the correct base URL, port, and path that should be used for external API consumption.

    • Any additional security or SSL configurations required (e.g., certificates or trusted CA setup).

  4. Troubleshooting Guidance:

    • If possible, provide logs or trace locations (e.g., /IWFND/ERROR_LOG, /IWBEP/ERROR_LOG, or ST22 dumps) to check for incoming request failures.

    • Confirm if external access to OData requires SAP Gateway or reverse proxy configuration.

Goal:

To enable successful connection and data retrieval from the activated SAP OData service via Postman, and later integrate the same endpoint in my external application connector.

Thanks!

entry.title: Question about tx ABAVN, ABAON, ABZON
entry.content:
Hi everyone

We are currently implementing SAP S4HANA 2023. In transactions ABAVN, ABAON, and ABZON, is it possible to post a fixed asset to more than one ledger?

We have five ledgers, but we need to post to only two, L4 and L5, for several fixed assets. Is it possible to do this in both ledgers, or can it only be done individually per ledger?

In R3, this was possible because it was done by movement type, as it allowed limiting the movement type by valuation area. In S4, movement types cannot be limited to valuation areas.

Our go-live date is January 2026.

Thanks and best regards.

entry.title: Cash Transfer - Batch
entry.content:
Hi,

we are using the Cash Transfer App (ID F0691) to transfer money from one bank account to another bank account. In addition, we are using the Bank Communication Management to create payment batches and send them to the Bank.

The batches are created automatically through the app and includes only one payment. Is it possible to stop the batch process and create batches with more than one payment?

entry.title: Create supplier invoice: How to disable the Post button
entry.content:
App id-F0859-Create supplier invoice.

We need to restrict this app from Posting, POST icon should be Disabled.

entry.title: 運用開始後にチケット：3226691を適用した際の業務影響について。
entry.content:
運用を開始している会計年度バリアントに対して、チケット：3226691 の手順を実施した際の業務影響についてご教示ください。
《チケット内容》
・SE38でPGM（FINS_GENERATE_FISCAL_PERIOD ）を実施

《確認内容》
①実施が必要な会計年度バリアントと不必要な会計年度バリアントの違い（全部対応必要かどうか）
①実施時の業務影響の有無
②業務影響がある場合の詳細内容
